      • clicked

        public boolean clicked(Location clickLocation)
        Description copied from interface: Interactable
        This method is called whenever a mouse generateClickForComponentAt is generated within the bounds of a Component which is interactive.
        Specified by:
        clicked in interface Interactable
        Parameters:
        clickLocation - The location within the terminal in which the mouse was clicked.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this component should now become a target for key events. (i.e. If this component should become focused in the terminal.)
